A C G I M O T 

G

getCollisionPosition(Ship, Ship) - Method in interface asteroids.facade.IFacade
Return the first position where ship1 and ship2 collide, or null if they never collide.
getDistanceBetween(Ship, Ship) - Method in interface asteroids.facade.IFacade
Return the distance between ship1 and ship2.
getShipOrientation(Ship) - Method in interface asteroids.facade.IFacade
Return the orientation of ship (in radians).
getShipPosition(Ship) - Method in interface asteroids.facade.IFacade
Return the position of ship as an array of length 2, with the x-coordinate at index 0 and the y-coordinate at index 1.
getShipRadius(Ship) - Method in interface asteroids.facade.IFacade
Return the radius of ship.
getShipVelocity(Ship) - Method in interface asteroids.facade.IFacade
Return the velocity of ship as an array of length 2, with the velocity along the X-axis at index 0 and the velocity along the Y-axis at index 1.
getTimeToCollision(Ship, Ship) - Method in interface asteroids.facade.IFacade
Return the number of seconds until the first collision between ship1 and ship2, or Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY if they never collide.
